ComicInfo.Summary:
The team battles a bizarre creature through a tear in space-time, but the mind behind the monster holds a secret that could change the PastAwaysâ€™ future! As they face a new kind of time paradox, the crew are also forced to contend with an internal plot against one of their own!
The next opus from Matt Kindt (MIND MGMT)!
The new arc kicks off with a bang!
Every issue contains bonus 2015 travelogues!
